original_title: Bob Seger and The Silver Bullet Band - Live at Capital Center Largo MD
overview: Bob Seger, and his band, The Silver Bullet Band, performed in  1980, at the Capital Center, in Largo, MD. Bob rocks and plays his  greatest hits. The only known pro-shot show from Detroit's rock legend Bob Seger & the Silver Bullet Band.  This show was recorded over 30 years ago during his 1980's "Against the Wind" tour.
title: Bob Seger and The Silver Bullet Band - Live at Capital Center Largo MD
